General.Name: Avaco Co. Ltd
General.Description: Avaco Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells equipment for flat panel display, semiconductor, solar, and thin film industries in South Korea. The company offers sputtering, OLED, and module systems; and solar, AMHS, and AS/RS products, as well as 3D printers and converting machines. It also provides contract manufacturing services. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Daegu, South Korea.

6.Name: Mr. Ji Myung  Wee
6.Title: VP and Gen. Mang. of Technology
